from Carl Rutman:

I just wanted to pass along the Brightcove Video Cloud SmartPlayer instructions for adding WebVTT Captions to your library of content;

Instructions;

1) Add the WebVTT JS Plugin to the Player
2) Add a "captions" custom Metadata Field to the account
3) Upload the DFXP closed caption file into Brightcove, upload the .vtt file to an online storage location
4) Add the .vtt file URL into the "captions" Custom Metadata field


You can get a copy of the plugin here, please save and re-post to your CORS-Headers-Enabled location;

Plugin URL: http://solutions.brightcove.com/crutman/webvtt.js
